message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $120. This unique opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a premium for a quality product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $100?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your budget constraints. However, I must respectfully decline your offer of $100. Our product is highly valued and has a production cost that exceeds that amount. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle at $110?
I understand that your product has a high value, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to go up to $105, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $105?
